医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新数据凸显了澳大利亚痴呆症的紧迫现实澳大利亚统计局（ABS）今天发布的最新数据突显了澳大利亚痴呆症的紧迫现实，表明痴呆症将成为该国的首要死因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-data-highlights-the-urgent-reality-of-dementia-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-data-highlights-the-urgent-reality-of-dementia-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b3ef11-6759-4493-ab7d-296468039d1c Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:23:00 -0400 New data highlights the urgent reality of dementia in Australia
研究人员创建了第一个产前人类皮肤的单细胞图谱研究人员首次创建了产前人类皮肤的单细胞图谱，以了解皮肤的形成方式以及疾病的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-create-first-single-cell-atlas-of-prenatal- human-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-create-first-single-cell-atlas-of-prenatal- human-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8415b799-ee0a-49c8-afe7-c00fd2a0842a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:22:00 -0400 Researchers create first single cell atlas of prenatal human skin
新研究强调遗传学是体重指数和肥胖风险的关键因素Genomics 在 Bupa 健康研讨会上展示的最新突破性研究表明，一个人的遗传背景是其 BMI 的关键驱动因素，因此对于了解其肥胖风险至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-research-highlights- Genetics-as-key-factor-in-BMI-and-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-research-highlights-genics-as-key-factor-in-BMI-and-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c1b7ba1-5b38-4b58-913e-b46a1da37151 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:19:00 -0400 New research highlights genetics as key factor in BMI and obesity risk
Accure Acne 获得 FDA 批准作为长期痤疮解决方案Accure Acne, Inc.™ 是开发治疗痤疮的创新解决方案的先驱，今天宣布，该公司已获得 FDA 的新许可 K242035，用于长期治疗轻度至重度炎症性寻常痤疮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Accure-Acne-secures-FDA-clearance-for-long-term-acne-solution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Accure-Acne-secures-FDA-clearance-for-long-term-acne-solution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4aba7c8-0aab-422d-957a-720fb2e662b6 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:14:00 -0400 Accure Acne secures FDA clearance for long-term acne solution
Sapio Sciences 通过新的免疫原性生物分析功能增强实验室信息学平台Science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布为其行业领先的实验室信息学平台添加新的免疫原性生物分析功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sapio-Sciences-enhances-lab-informatics-platform-with-new-immunogenicity-bioanalysis-features.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sapio-Sciences-enhances-lab-informatics-platform-with-new-immunogenicity-bioanalysis-features.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fa31c30-7e61-494a-8c16-e2f8b74eb840 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:10:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences enhances lab informatics platform with new immunogenicity bioanalysis features
揭示血液渗漏在阿尔茨海默病和多发性硬化症中的隐藏作用阿尔茨海默氏症或多发性硬化症等复杂神经系统疾病的病因一直困扰着科学家和医生，因为未知因素阻碍了早期诊断和有效治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Revealing-the-hidden-role-of-blood-leaks-in-Alzheimere28099s-and-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Revealing-the-hidden-role-of-blood-leaks-in-Alzheimere28099s-and-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aca81f17-ab1e-42bb-98c8-49b2e37398b4 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 01:05:46 -0400 Revealing the hidden role of blood leaks in Alzheimer’s and MS
研究人员发现与早衰症心血管健康相关的蛋白质马里兰大学领导的一项新发现可能会刺激哈钦森-吉尔福德早衰综合症（HGPS）新的和改进的治疗方法的开发，这是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，目前尚无已知的治疗方法，会导致儿童加速衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-identify- Protein-linked-to-cardioangiography-health-in-progeria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-identify- Protein-linked-to-cardiovian-health-in-progeria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acabe770-0dd8-49d4-a833-ccb9cbec203e Fri, 18 Oct 2024 00:59:01 -0400 Researchers identify protein linked to cardiovascular health in progeria
发现新蛋白质可以保护细胞免受与年龄相关的衰退麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现了一种以前未知的蛋白质的细胞保护功能，这可能为治疗与年龄相关的疾病开辟新途径，并导致整体上更健康的衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New- Protein-found-to-protect-cells-from-age-lated-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New- Protein-found-to-protect-cells-from-age-lated-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc11c3bf-83c9-4cda-b0f4-136c184f5dc6 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 00:53:40 -0400 New protein found to protect cells from age-related decline
新的风险计算器赋予胸外科医生权力胸外科医生协会 (STS) 宣布发布两款新的风险计算器，为胸外科医患决策提供信息。这些交互式工具利用 STS 普通胸外科数据库的当代数据进行设计，为外科医生提供准确的术前风险评估，以评估癌症食管切除术和肺癌肺切除术的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-risk-calculators-empower-thoracic-surgeons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-risk-calculators-empower-thoracic-surgeons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3d780d-556b-4946-b0dc-8eba4d43111b Fri, 18 Oct 2024 00:46:56 -0400 New risk calculators empower thoracic surgeons
揭开儿童食欲自我调节的复杂性健康饮食行为的基础始于婴儿期。幼儿学习通过生物、心理和社会学因素的结合来调节食欲。在一篇新论文中，伊利诺伊大学香槟分校的研究人员提出了一个模型，探索这些因素及其相互作用，为更好地理解儿童食欲自我调节提供指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Unraveling-the-complexities-of-childhood-appetite-self-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Unraveling-the-complexities-of-childhood-appetite-self-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51e382fa-f3c7-4fa6-82d1-7e9b450e0e7f Fri, 18 Oct 2024 00:41:20 -0400 Unraveling the complexities of childhood appetite self-regulation
